metadata.summary: Configure cloud sensors using the Config Hive to store webhook sensor configurations with identity, platform, and authentication settings
metadata.primary_use_case: Store and manage cloud sensor configurations including webhook endpoints and authentication secrets

extracted_apis.path: limacharlie hive [-k KEY] [-d DATA] [-pk PARTITIONKEY] [--etag ETAG] [--expiry EXPIRY] [--enabled ENABLED] [--tags TAGS] action hive_name
extracted_apis.description: Manage hive configuration for cloud sensors via CLI

extracted_apis.path: limacharlie hive set hive_name -k KEY -d DATA
extracted_apis.description: Set hive record with JSON data
